concept.title: Request-For-Broadcast
concept.shortdesc: An intermediate form between Request- and Broadcast-Based inter-Node communication: A node broadcasts a request for a specific information to all other nodes. It then awaits another node broadcasting the requested information.

p.note: This is comparable to someone writing Does anyone know if [â€¦] in a chat room. The person requesting the information needs no knowledge of who posesses that information. It is up to the person with this information to recognize this and broadcast that information.
